name: codelyzer
description: Linting for Angular 2 applications, following angular.io/styleguide.

0.0.10.name: codelyzer
0.0.10.description: A set of linters for Angular 2 applications, following https://github.com/mgechev/angular2-style-guide.

0.0.11.description: A set of linters for Angular 2 applications, following https://github.com/mgechev/angular2-style-guide.

0.0.14.name: codelyzer
0.0.14.description: A set of linters for Angular 2 applications, following https://github.com/mgechev/angular2-style-guide.

scripts.release: rimraf dist && tsc && npm t && cp package.json dist/src

0.0.15.name: codelyzer
0.0.15.description: A set of linters for Angular 2 applications, following https://github.com/mgechev/angular2-style-guide.

scripts.release: rimraf dist && tsc && npm t && cp package.json README.md dist/src

0.0.19.name: codelyzer
0.0.19.description: A set of linters for Angular 2 applications, following https://github.com/mgechev/angular2-style-guide.

scripts.release: rimraf dist && tsc && npm t && cp package.json README.md dist/src && ts-node build/links.ts --src ./dist/src
